definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: Like the Hindus, the Arabs worked freely with irrationals.
sentences.chinese: 阿拉伯人也象印度人那樣隨便使用無理數。

sentences.english: When this rotating speed ratio is an irrational number, the distribution of grinding track becomes finer.
sentences.chinese: 當轉速比爲無理數時，研磨軌跡的分佈較緻密。

sentences.english: The logical definition of the irrational number is rather sophisticated.
sentences.chinese: 無理數的邏輯主義是頗有些不自然的。

sentences.english: The decimal form of an irrational number is a non-repeating and non-terminating decimal number.
sentences.chinese: 一個無理數寫成小數形式是無限不循環的。

sentences.english: The spring constant is replaced by the weighting function.
sentences.chinese: 中的底，這個常數是無理數。

sentences.english: He produced his beautiful treatment of irrational numbers.
sentences.chinese: 他對無理數作了出色的處理。

sentences.english: The square root of two is an irrational number.
sentences.chinese: 二的平方根是一個無理數。
